snippet: President Obama’s top adviser on energy and climate change, Heather Zichal, plans to step down in the next few weeks after five years at the White House, officials said Monday.
abstract: Pres Obama’s top adviser on energy and climate change, Heather Zichal, plans to step down after five years at White House.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s top adviser on energy and climate change, Heather Zichal, plans to step down in the next few weeks after five years at the White House, officials said Monday.

headline.main: Obama’s Adviser on Climate Change Plans to Leave
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Adviser On Climate Change Plans To Leave
